# [Interview #974: AMOL Signing Report - J. Dauro, Entry #57](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=974#57)

#### Question

Demandred, when he does the coming out scene with the big reveal. Was that you or Robert Jordan?

#### Brandon Sanderson

That was me.
